title: Minder

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose a player to investigate at night. You will out whether or not they are a member of the Town.
- Choose another player to target at night. You must keep them alive to win. You may only do this once.
- Choose to protect your target at night. They will gain Invincible defense for the night. The next day, they cannot be voted up. You may only do this twice.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you choose a member of the Town as your target, you will commit suicide and lose.
- If your target dies at night, you will commit suicide and loes.
- You have a layer of Basic defense that can block one attack.
- Roleblock and redirect immune

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure that your target is alive at the end of the game, regardless of whether or not you are alive.
